attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore, Sir Tom
attributes.additional_details: He surely deserves the honour, every bit if not more, than any professional politician or privileged person.
attributes.background: Please recognise the extraordinary achievement of Captain Tom Moore, by awarding him the highest honour the nation can bestow, and make him Sir Tom Moore for his amazing contribution in raising millions of pounds for the NHS, a 100 year old war veteran.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
